name: Someone's at Robin's House
description:
On Halloween night, five friends meet up around a fire pit to tell scary fire pit stories.

But the catch is, they are all telling the same story, each with their own take on what happened around a series of mysterious events.

There was a Red Panda, named Robin. His boyfriend went missing.

And then, so did he.

Not really though. It's just story.

This game features furry characters, tantalizing gay romances, and some good clean Halloween fun (and violence).

(This is my first game so any feedback is super appreciated! Leave a comment or find me at  https://twitter.com/GhostGreenGame)

Updates:
v1.1 - made some little changes to hopefully fix a movement issue with some machines!
